homePage.customerCardDescription: Here you will find all the data about the customers and their bikes, you can also add and delete them.
homePage.servicePanelCardDescription: Here you can enter further service orders, view completed ones and edit them.

userTable.searchPlaceholder: Search for phone number, name, e-mail

addNewCustomer.heading: Add new Customer
addNewCustomer.firstNameTooLongToastError: Error: The length of first name must be 100 characters or fewer.
addNewCustomer.lastNameTooLongToastError: Error: The length of last name must be 100 characters or fewer.
addNewCustomer.emailTooLongToastError: Error: The length of email must be 100 characters or fewer.
addNewCustomer.tagsTooLongToastError: Error: The length of tags must be 250 characters or fewer.
addNewCustomer.emailAlreadyUsedToastError: Error: This email is already used.
addNewCustomer.companyNameTooLongToastError: Error: The length of Company Name must be 100 characters or fewer.
addNewCustomer.taxNumberTooLongToastError: Error: The length of Tax Number must be 30 characters or fewer.
addNewCustomer.streetNameTooLongToastError: Error: The length of Street Name must be 100 characters or fewer.
addNewCustomer.postCodeTooLongToastError: Error: The length of Post Code must be 20 characters or fewer.
addNewCustomer.cityTooLongToastError: Error: The length of city must be 100 characters or fewer.
addNewCustomer.companyNameAlreadyUsedToastError: Error: This Company Name is already registered.
addNewCustomer.companyNotEmptyToastError: Error: Company name field can't be empty.
addNewCustomer.taxNumberNotEmptyToastError: Error: Tax number field can't be empty.
addNewCustomer.streetNameNotEmptyErrorToast: Error: Street name field can't be empty.
addNewCustomer.postCodeNotEmptyErrorToast: Error: Post code field can't be empty.
addNewCustomer.cityNotEmptyErrorToast: Error: City field can't be empty.
addNewCustomer.successToast: Success: Customer has been added successfully.

addNewEmployee.successToast: Success: Employee has been added successfully.

servicePanel.errorToast: Error: Too many characters entered into field.
servicePanel.successToast: Success: Order has been added successfully.
